basic.description:
Looks at how questions of colonialism, hegemony and decolonization have affected major trends shaping Quebec society and culture in the 19th and 20th centuries. Centers on the French-speaking population and focuses on family formation, gender roles, the Catholic Church, popular entertainment and mentalities.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Culture and Postcolonialism in French Canada

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
